item.description:
Come join us on the Driving Range at Mel’s Funway in Litchfield. Work on that swing or just have fun. Never played golf before or fairly new at the sport? Well, this is a great way to start. Although far from experts, we can at least teach you the basics ……..and believe me, we WILL have some laughs. So come start YOUR day in a good frame of mind.

The special is $ 7. for ALL the BALLS YOU CAN HIT from 7 am thru Noon. There are; 20 Grass Tees, 20 Grass Mats, and 10 Covered Stalls to keep you dry on those rainy days - no umbrella necessary!

So let’s kick this thing off on Friday, August 31st @ 7:00am. Too early? Post your comments and I’ll adjust the meetup time to accommodate the majority. Not a good day of the week? Again, post your comments. It would be great to turn this into a regular weekly meetup continuing throughout the fall.
item.how_to_find_us: At the driving range - I'll be wearing a cap with a "meetup"pin on the back.
item.name: Early Morning Driving Range Meetup
